mapper.select:
SELECT 'user' AS "itemType" ,'so' AS "so" , ur.USERID AS "UserID" , ur.USERCODE AS AN , ur.MULTIDISPLAYNAME AS DN , bg.JOBLEVELCODE || '|' || bg.MULTIJOBLEVELNAME AS LV , bg.JOBTITLECODE || '|' || bg.MULTIJOBTITLENAME AS TL , bg.JOBPOSITIONCODE || '|' || bg.MULTIJOBPOSITIONNAME AS PO , ur.MOBILE AS MT , ur.MOBILE AS "Mobile" , ur.MAILADDRESS AS EM , ur.PHONENUMBER AS OT , ur.FAX , ur.EMPNO AS USEC , bg.DEPTCODE AS RG , bg.DEPTCODE AS SG , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS RGNM , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS SGNM , bg.COMPANYCODE AS ETID , bg.MULTICOMPANYNAME AS ETNM , NVL(bg.JOBTYPE,'Origin') AS "JobType" , ur.USERCODE AS "UserCode" , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS "ExGroupName" , ur.PHONENUMBERINTER AS "PhoneNumberInter" , ur.CHARGEBUSINESS AS "ChargeBusiness" , ur.PHOTOPATH AS "PhotoPath" , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= NVL(TO_CHAR(info.ABSENSETERMSTART, 'YYYYMMDD'), '19010101') AND NVL(TO_CHAR(info.ABSENSETERMEND, 'YYYYMMDD'), '19010101') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND info.ABSENSEUSEYN != 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS "AbsenseUseYN" , ur.SORTKEY , bg.JOBTITLESORTKEY , bg.JOBLEVELSORTKEY , ur.ENTERDATE , CASE WHEN NVL(info.AbsenseTermEnd, To_Date('19010101' , 'RR/MM/DD')) >= SYSDATE AND info.AbsenseUseYN <> 'N' THEN info.AbsenseType ELSE '' END AS "AbsenseType" , CASE WHEN NVL(info.AbsenseTermEnd, To_Date('19010101' , 'RR/MM/DD')) >= SYSDATE AND info.AbsenseUseYN <> 'N' THEN NVL(info.AbsenseReason,'') ELSE NVL(NULL,'') END AS "AbsenseReason"
, NVL(( SELECT VI.VacFlag FROM VM_VACATIONINFO_DAY VI WHERE UR_Code = ur.UserCode AND VI.VacDate = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (CASE WHEN VacOffFlag IN ('AM', 'PM') THEN ( CASE WHEN VacOffFlag = 'AM' AND TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24') < 13 THEN 1 WHEN VacOffFlag = 'PM' AND TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24') >= 13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) ELSE 1 END ) > 0 AND ROWNUM <= 1 ), '') AS "VacStatus" , NVL(( SELECT CASE WHEN attEndTime IS NOT NULL THEN 'lbl_att_offWork' WHEN attEndTime IS NULL THEN 'lbl_att_goWork' ELSE NULL END FROM ATTEND_COMMUTING_MST acm WHERE acm.UserCode = ur.UserCode AND targetDate = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND length(attStartTime) > 0 ),'lbl_n_att_absent') AS "AttendStatus" , NVL(( SELECT amh.JobStsName || ';' || StartTime || ';' || EndTime || ';' || ETC FROM ATTEND_JOB_HISTORY amh WHERE amh.UserCode = ur.UserCode AND JobDate = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND amh.STARTTIME <= TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24MI') AND amh.ENDTIME > TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24MI') ),'') AS "JobStatus"
FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP bg LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER ur ON ur.USERCODE = bg.USERCODE LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_INFO info ON bg.USERCODE = info.USERCODE
LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_GROUP gr ON bg.DEPTCODE = gr.GROUPCODE
AND ur.ISUSE = 'Y' AND ur.ISDISPLAY = 'Y'
AND ';'||gr.GROUPPATH LIKE '%;'||#{deptCode}||';%'
AND bg.DEPTCODE = #{deptCode}
AND bg.COMPANYCODE = #{companyCode}
AND ur.MULTIDISPLAYNAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND bg.MULTIDEPTNAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND bg.MULTIJOBPOSITIONNAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND bg.MULTIJOBLEVELNAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND bg.MULTIJOBTITLENAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND (REPLACE(ur.Mobile,'-','') like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' OR ur.Mobile like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' )
AND (REPLACE(ur.PhoneNumber,'-','') like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' OR ur.PhoneNumber like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' )
AND ur.MailAddress like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND ur.CHARGEBUSINESS like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND ur.UserCode IN
#{usercode}
AND ( ur.MULTIDISPLAYNAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR bg.MULTIDEPTNAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR bg.MULTIJOBPOSITIONNAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR bg.MULTIJOBLEVELNAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR bg.MULTIJOBTITLENAME like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR REPLACE(ur.Mobile,'-','') like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' OR replace(ur.PhoneNumber,'-','') like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' OR ur.MailAddress like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR ur.CHARGEBUSINESS like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )
Order By
bg.JOBTITLESORTKEY ASC
bg.JOBLEVELSORTKEY ASC
bg.JOBPOSITIONSORTKEY ASC
DN ASC
, ur.SORTKEY ASC, ur.ENTERDATE ASC
(ur.SORTKEY+0) ASC, bg.JOBTITLESORTKEY ASC, bg.JOBLEVELSORTKEY ASC, bg.JOBPOSITIONSORTKEY ASC, ur.ENTERDATE ASC, DN ASC

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT 'user' AS "itemType" ,'so' AS "so" , ur.USERID AS "UserID" , ur.USERCODE AS AN , ur.MULTIDISPLAYNAME AS DN , bg.JOBLEVELCODE||'|'||bg.MULTIJOBLEVELNAME AS LV , bg.JOBTITLECODE||'|'||bg.MULTIJOBTITLENAME AS TL , bg.JOBPOSITIONCODE||'|'||bg.MULTIJOBPOSITIONNAME AS PO , ur.MOBILE AS MT , ur.MOBILE AS "Mobile" , ur.MAILADDRESS AS EM , ur.PHONENUMBER AS OT , ur.FAX , ur.EMPNO AS USEC , bg.DEPTCODE AS RG , bg.DEPTCODE AS SG , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS RGNM , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS SGNM , bg.COMPANYCODE AS ETID , bg.MULTICOMPANYNAME AS ETNM , NVL(bg.JOBTYPE,'Origin') AS "JobType" , ur.USERCODE AS "UserCode" , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS "ExGroupName" , ur.PHONENUMBERINTER AS "PhoneNumberInter" , ur.CHARGEBUSINESS AS "ChargeBusiness" , ur.PHOTOPATH AS "PhotoPath" , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= NVL(TO_CHAR(info.ABSENSETERMSTART, 'YYYYMMDD'), '19010101') AND NVL(TO_CHAR(info.ABSENSETERMEND, 'YYYYMMDD'), '19010101') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND info.ABSENSEUSEYN != 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS "AbsenseUseYN" , CASE WHEN NVL(info.AbsenseTermEnd, To_Date('19010101' , 'RR/MM/DD')) >= SYSDATE AND info.AbsenseUseYN <> 'N' THEN info.AbsenseType ELSE '' END AS "AbsenseType" , CASE WHEN NVL(info.AbsenseTermEnd, To_Date('19010101' , 'RR/MM/DD')) >= SYSDATE AND info.AbsenseUseYN <> 'N' THEN NVL(info.AbsenseReason,'') ELSE NVL(NULL,'') END AS "AbsenseReason"
, NVL(( SELECT (SELECT BC.codeName FROM SYS_BASE_CODE BC WHERE BC.CodeGroup = 'VACATION_TYPE' AND BC.IsUse = 'Y' AND BC.DomainID = bg.CompanyCode AND VI.VacFlag = BC.Code) || ';' || VI.Gubun FROM VM_VACATIONINFO VI WHERE UR_Code = ur.UserCode AND VacYear = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'yyyy') AND Sdate >= TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND Edate < TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSTIMESTAMP ,'0')+1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (CASE WHEN VacOffFlag IN ('AM', 'PM') THEN ( CASE WHEN VacOffFlag = 'AM' AND TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24') < 13 THEN 1 WHEN VacOffFlag = 'PM' AND TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24') >= 13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) ELSE 1 END ) > 0 AND ROWNUM <= 1 ), '') AS "VacStatus" , NVL(( SELECT CASE WHEN attEndTime IS NOT NULL THEN 'lbl_att_offWork' WHEN attEndTime IS NULL THEN 'lbl_att_goWork' ELSE NULL END FROM ATTEND_COMMUTING_MST acm WHERE acm.UserCode = ur.UserCode AND targetDate = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND length(attStartTime) > 0 ),'lbl_n_att_absent') AS "AttendStatus" , NVL(( SELECT amh.JobStsName || ';' || StartTime || ';' || EndTime || ';' || ETC FROM ATTEND_JOB_HISTORY amh WHERE amh.UserCode = ur.UserCode AND JobDate = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND amh.STARTTIME <= TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24MI') AND amh.ENDTIME > TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24MI') ),'') AS "JobStatus"
FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER ur INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP bg ON ur.USERCODE = bg.USERCODE LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_GROUP_MEMBER gm ON ur.USERCODE = gm.USERCODE LEFT JOIN sys_object_user_info info ON ur.USERCODE = info.USERCODE
LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_GROUP gr ON gm.GroupCode = gr.GroupCode
AND ur.IsUse = 'Y' AND ur.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND gm.IsUse = 'Y' AND bg.JobType = 'Origin'
AND ';'||gr.GroupPath LIKE '%;'||#{groupCode}||';%'
AND gr.IsMail = #{isMailChk}
AND gm.GroupCode = #{groupCode}
AND ur.MultiDisplayName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND bg.MultiDeptName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND bg.MultiJobPositionName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND bg.MultiJobLevelName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND ( REPLACE(ur.Mobile,'-','') like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' OR ur.Mobile like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' )
AND ur.ChargeBusiness like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'
AND ( ur.MultiDisplayName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR bg.MultiDeptName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR bg.MultiJobPositionName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR bg.MultiJobLevelName like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR REPLACE(ur.Mobile,'-','') like '%'||REPLACE(#{searchText},'-','')||'%' OR ur.ChargeBusiness like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' )
Order By
bg.JOBTITLESORTKEY ASC
bg.JOBLEVELSORTKEY ASC
bg.JOBPOSITIONSORTKEY ASC
DN ASC
, ur.SORTKEY ASC, ur.ENTERDATE ASC
ur.SORTKEY ASC, bg.JOBTITLESORTKEY ASC, bg.JOBLEVELSORTKEY ASC, bg.JOBPOSITIONSORTKEY ASC, ur.ENTERDATE ASC, DN ASC
) A

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT a.UserCode AS "UserCode" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, a.MultiDisplayName)AS "UserName" , a.MailAddress AS "MailAddress" , a.Mobile AS "Mobile" , a.DisplayName AS "DisplayName"
, FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, b.MultiDeptName)AS "DeptName"
FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER a LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP b ON a.UserCode = b.UserCode
AND a.IsUse = 'Y' AND a.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND b.JobType = 'Origin'
AND a.MultiDisplayName LIKE '%'||#{UserName}||'%'
AND (a.MultiDisplayName LIKE '%'||#{UserName}||'%' OR AND a.MailAddress LIKE '%'||#{MailAddress}||'%')
AND b.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}
ORDER BY a.DisplayName DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT a.UserCode AS "Code" , 'UR' AS "Type" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, a.MultiDisplayName) AS "Name" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, b.MultiDeptName) AS "DeptName" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, b.MultiJobLevelName) AS "JobLevelName" , PHOTOPATH AS "PhotoPath" FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER a LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP b ON a.UserCode = b.UserCode WHERE a.IsUse = 'Y' AND a.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND b.JobType = 'Origin' AND b.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}
UNION
SELECT GroupCode AS "Code" , DECODE(GroupType,'Company','CM','GR') AS "Type" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) AS "Name" , '' AS "DeptName" , '' AS "JobLevelName" , '' AS "PhotoPath" FROM SYS_OBJECT_GROUP WHERE IsUse = 'Y' AND IsDisplay = 'Y' AND GroupType IN ('Community','Company','Dept','JobLevel','JobPosition','JobTitle','Manage','Officer','Region') AND CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} ) A
WHERE A."Name" LIKE '%'||#{KeyWord}||'%'
ORDER BY A."Name" ASC ) B WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT 'group' AS "itemType" ,gr.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" ,gr.GroupCode AS "GroupCode" ,gr.GroupType AS "GroupType" ,gr.MultiDisplayName AS "GroupName" ,cn.MultiDisplayName AS "CompanyName" ,gr.PrimaryMail AS "PrimaryMail" ,gr.MemberOf AS "MemberOf" ,gr.GroupCode AS "AN" ,gr.MultiDisplayName AS "DN" ,gr.PrimaryMail AS "EM" ,cn.CompanyCode AS "ETID" ,cn.MultiDisplayName AS "ETNM" ,gr.MemberOf AS "SGAN" ,gr.MemberOf AS "SGDN" ,gr.Receivable AS "RCV" ,gr.SortPath AS "SortPath" ,gr.GroupPath AS "GroupPath" ,gr.GroupID AS "GroupID" ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM sys_object_group self WHERE self.MemberOf =gr.GroupCode AND self.IsUse = 'Y') AS "hasChild" , REPLACE(SYS_GETFULLPATH(gr.GROUPCODE, #{lang}),'@','>') AS "GroupFullPath" , gr.Approvable AS "Approvable" , gr.Receivable AS "Receivable" , gr.ISMAIL AS "IsMail" FROM sys_object_group gr LEFT JOIN sys_object_group cn ON gr.CompanyCode = cn.GroupCode AND cn.GroupType = 'Company'
AND gr.IsUse = 'Y' AND gr.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND (gr.MemberOf != 'NOUSE' OR gr.MemberOf is null) AND (gr.MemberOf != 'NOUNIT' OR gr.MemberOf is null)
AND gr.GroupType IN ('Dept','Company')
AND gr.GroupType != 'Dept'
AND ( (REGEXP_LIKE(gr.GroupPath, '_Community'||';'||(SELECT CU_Code FROM COMMUNITY WHERE CU_ID = #{communityId}))) OR (NOT REGEXP_LIKE(gr.GroupPath, '_Community'||';')) )
AND gr.memberOf = #{memberOf}
AND gr.CompanyCode =#{companyCode}
gr.SortPath asc

SELECT 'user' AS itemType , ur.USERID AS "UserID" , ur.USERCODE AS AN , ur.MULTIDISPLAYNAME AS DN , bg.JOBLEVELCODE || '|' || bg.MULTIJOBLEVELNAME AS LV , bg.JOBTITLECODE || '|' || bg.MULTIJOBTITLENAME AS TL , bg.JOBPOSITIONCODE || '|' || bg.MULTIJOBPOSITIONNAME AS PO , ur.MOBILE AS MT , ur.MOBILE AS "Mobile" , ur.MAILADDRESS AS EM , ur.PHONENUMBER AS OT , ur.FAX , ur.EMPNO AS USEC , bg.DEPTCODE AS RG , bg.DEPTCODE AS SG , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS RGNM , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS SGNM , bg.COMPANYCODE AS ETID , bg.MULTICOMPANYNAME AS ETNM , NVL(bg.JOBTYPE,'Origin') AS "JobType" , ur.USERCODE AS "UserCode" , bg.MULTIDEPTNAME AS "ExGroupName" , ur.PHONENUMBERINTER AS "PhoneNumberInter" , ur.CHARGEBUSINESS AS "ChargeBusiness" , ur.PHOTOPATH AS "PhotoPath"
FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP bg JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER ur ON ur.USERCODE = bg.USERCODE WHERE bg.JOBTYPE = 'Origin' AND ur.USERCODE IN
#{item}
Order By (ur.SORTKEY+0) ASC, bg.JOBTITLESORTKEY ASC, bg.JOBLEVELSORTKEY ASC, bg.JobTitlecode ASC, ur.ENTERDATE ASC, DN ASC

SELECT 'group' AS itemType ,gr.COMPANYCODE AS "CompanyCode" ,gr.GROUPCODE AS "GroupCode" ,gr.GROUPTYPE AS "GroupType" ,gr.MULTIDISPLAYNAME AS "GroupName" ,cn.MULTIDISPLAYNAME AS "CompanyName" ,gr.PRIMARYMAIL AS "PrimaryMail" ,gr.MEMBEROF AS "MemberOf" ,gr.GROUPCODE AS AN ,gr.MULTIDISPLAYNAME AS DN ,gr.PRIMARYMAIL AS EM ,cn.COMPANYCODE AS ETID ,cn.MULTIDISPLAYNAME AS ETNM ,gr.MEMBEROF AS SGAN ,gr.MEMBEROF AS SGDN ,gr.RECEIVABLE AS RCV ,gr.SORTPATH AS "SortPath" ,gr.GROUPPATH AS "GroupPath" ,gr.GROUPID AS "GroupID" FROM SYS_OBJECT_GROUP gr LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_GROUP cn ON gr.COMPANYCODE = cn.GROUPCODE AND cn.GROUPTYPE = 'Company'
WHERE gr.GROUPCODE IN
#{item}
ORDER BY gr.SORTPATH asc
